WorkItem.Description:
Hi,   If any of the textarea's parents have a relative position, the position of the jHtmlAreaColorPickerMenu will be incorrect (it'll be too far to the top/left). I believe this is because owner.position() only returns the position relative to it's parent, not the absolute position.   The following example will display the color picker in the wrong location.  
  Thanks for a great HTML editor...   Regards, Tom
WorkItem.Summary: Color picker position incorrect if inside relative div element
